Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory68.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "That's one trial passed... but now we've got more questions.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'The key with the portrait of a Construct.', 3: '7'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "That's right. I thought it would just be a normal key, but I wasn't expecting a portrait on it.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Do you think it means anything?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'We should first figure out why these mechanoids would make a stamp like this...', 4: '3'}
{2: 'The supply crates.', 3: '10', 4: 'Maybe they know us?', 5: '11'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It's probably the most sensible deduction, assuming they found out about us after going through the supply crates.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Not very possible.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But stamping the portrait on them has to be a message.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm guessing it has something to do with the ghost-hunting part of the event. Maybe the person on the key would come to our assistance or something.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Or the person is the target of the hunt...', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Either way, having this key means we can access the ghost-hunting venue, albeit only one of the areas. I think Commandant should give it a go.', 4: '2'}
{2: "I've tried it already.", 3: '16', 4: "Let's do it later.", 5: '17'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Was that why you were gone just now...?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Understood. We'll leave that decision to you, Commandant.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The second trial is up ahead. I wonder what it is...', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'I hear somebody calling for the South General!'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Watch out, Commandant! Something's falling from the sky!", 4: '2'}
{3: "You dodge just in time thanks to Lucia's warning, but you still cannot escape the impact from whatever is hitting the ground."}
{1: '1', 2: 'South General', 3: 'Ho ho ho! South General, at your service! Aspirants of wisdom, were you the ones who call for me?', 4: '1'}
{2: "We weren't.", 3: '24', 4: "We're just looking for the second trial.", 5: '24'}
{2: 'South General', 3: 'It was you indeed! Ho ho ho!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "...This guy's just making a speech.", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'South General', 3: "I'm sure that you would know it requires more than simply perception to expose a ghost! It also takes the wisdom of improvising according to your circumstances!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'So the second trial is a trial of wisdom?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'South General', 3: 'The wisdom to "improvise," that is.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "You're really emphasizing that word, aren't you? How about let me tackle this one, Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'South General', 3: 'Ho ho ho, a challenger approaches!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'South General', 3: 'Let the trial begin! Scene change!', 4: '1'}
